str2: A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Middle or Passive - Vocative Masculine Plural
str2: To love, wish well to, take pleasure in, long for; denotes the love of reason, esteem. Perhaps from agan; to love.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: A choosing out, selecting, choice (by God). From eklegomai; selection.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
